wikipedia_page.main: Laura Toogood (born 9 December 1984) is an author and expert on digital issues. In 2015, she won the 'Women of the Future Award' for Digital and Technology. She also won the Spear's Magazine Future Leader in Wealth Management Award and was selected for Management Today's 35 Under 35 list of top businesswomen.

response: * Laura Toogood (born 1984), British writer, academic and equestrian
